name: Streadata.io API Gallery - Stocklytics
description: This is a repository of stocklytics APIs, self-contained as a Github repository, with HTML and YAML representations of the APIs and their surrounding operations.

apis.name: Stocklytics
apis.description: Build feature rich, fast applications and websites based around accurate stock market data. Launch in hours rather than days using the Stocklytics API. The Stocklytics API is a powerful, low-cost RESTful API allowing you to create stock/ financial based apps and websites with data from our service. Such as historical stock price data that can be used for creating stock charts and determining trends. We also offer a company financial data API which allows your to get company information for a particular Stock Code.
